definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
vegetable or food basket/(fig.) food supply

sentences.english: The United States has been the world’s breadbasket for more than half a century.
sentences.chinese: 過去的半個世紀內，美國一直是世界的麪包籃子。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the government should make efforts to set aside an appropriate fund for the vegetable basket program.
sentences.chinese: 人們建議政府應該做出努力，爲菜籃子工程撥出專款。

sentences.english: One makes baskets by interlacing reeds or fibers.
His mommy was headed toward the clothesline with a basket of wet clothes.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽提着一籃子溼衣服，朝晾衣繩這邊走來。

sentences.english: But I saved it. I put my basket on top.
sentences.chinese: 但是我佔位置了，我放潦攀籃子在上面。

sentences.english: "Don't put all your eggs in one basket." is all wrong.
sentences.chinese: “別把所有的雞蛋放進一個籃子”之說大錯特錯。

sentences.english: She crushed the bootee back into the basket and squeezed past the guardhouse.
sentences.chinese: 她把幼兒小毛線鞋放進籃子裏面，擠過警衛室。

sentences.english: The billet fell as he spoke, and he threw it into a basket.
sentences.chinese: 他說着話，木柴掉了下來，他把它扔到籃子裏。
編籃子這一行已逐漸衰弱。

sentences.english: There are some fruits in the basket.
See the four of us and Chichi sitting in the basket of the hot-air balloon.
sentences.chinese: 瞧，我們四個人和奇奇正坐在熱氣球的籃子裏。

sentences.english: But the one with the blue ribbon is just for you and Zachary .
sentences.chinese: 這個系藍絲帶的籃子是給你們的。

sentences.english: The clothes on the washing-line were frozen stiff and I couldn't fold them into the basket.
sentences.chinese: 晾衣繩上的衣服凍硬了，我無法將它們塞進籃子裏。

sentences.english: The basket held a heart shaped pillow to which Brad had secured our rings with pieces of wire.
sentences.chinese: 籃子裏有個雞心狀的墊枕，上面用金屬線固定住戒指。

sentences.english: Ann holds the empty basketry. Her hand is still wet.
sentences.chinese: 而安兩手溼溼地抱着空空的籃子。

sentences.english: The mother cat settled down in the basket with her kittens.
sentences.chinese: 貓媽媽和她的小寶寶們在籃子裏安頓下來。

definition: hook (on which to hang sth)/to couple/to link together/to establish contact with/hook/coupling links (e.g. between two railway coaches)
to weave/to plait/to compile/to put together (a lesson plan, budget etc)
